mapper.insert: INSERT Corporate (name, corporateNo, representative, roadAddress, detailAddress, postCode) VALUES (#{name}, #{corporateNo}, #{representative}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{postCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE Corporate SET name = #{name}, corporateNo = #{corporateNo}, representative = #{representative}, roadAddress = #{roadAddress}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, postcode = #{postCode} WHERE ID = #{id}
